page.title: 03MEDIA IN IGHTHAM (cont)
page.content: graphers and 1 Manager with 4 Assist- ants. Some of the more recent news in the local papers include the delivery of a{letter bomb}to a house in the {village.The explosion blew out the {kitchen and killed}the lady who lived there.In February, 1985 the school was broken into and the safe containing Â£170 was stolen.The results of an enquiry into the volume of traffic using Bates Hill on the A227 and the concern this gave to lghtham residents was extensively reported. Reports and photographs of our activities in school are often carried in the Chronicle.{The latest being our {visit to the Chronicle offices to {interview Mr Baldwin for this entry in {the BBC Domesday Project.
